A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Love it\, even though the first 30 minutes got me worry where my favorite series was heading. It was satisfying. I loved to see old characters that i haven't seen in decades (Master Yoda). It was sad to see my favorite charecters (Luke\, Leia) showed how merciless time is even in a galaxy far way\, Overall the movie is amazing\, Me and my family love it. Another great chapter to an amazing story that I started watching since I was 7 years old.
